make me a python program which can read a json file called data.json and with a GUI quizes the user a question at a time with the questions and answers found in the Json file. The Json schema for data.json is as follows:"schema": {"$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#","type": "object","properties": {"categories": {"type": "array","items": {"type": "object","properties": {"name": { "type": "string" },"subcategories": {"type": "array","items": {"type": "object","properties": {"name": { "type": "string" },"questions": {"type": "array","items": {"type": "object","properties": {"question": { "type": "string" },"answer": { "type": "string" }},"required": ["question", "answer"]}}},"required": ["name", "questions"]}}},"required": ["name", "subcategories"]}},"required": ["categories"]}}
